issue.title: [CF 668] Lua error message while logging in the game
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. LOgging in the game once, cause BugGrabber to collect a lua error message

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen v6.0.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
19x TellMeWhen: Condition MELEEAP tried to write values to Env different than those that were already in it.
Components\Core\Conditions\Conditions.lua:781: in function "GetConditionCheckFunctionString"
Components\Core\Conditions\Conditions.lua:1239: in function "GetConditionObject"
Components\Core\Conditions\Conditions.lua:1202: in function "Construct"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.0.3.lua:3951: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3906>
(tail call): ?
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":5
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.0.3.lua:3527: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3482>
(tail call): ?
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":5
(tail call): ?

TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.0.3.lua:2858: in function "?"
Ace3-r1066\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0-6.lua:147: in function <Ace3\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":4: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":4
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":13: in function "?"
Ace3-r1066\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0-6.lua:92: in function "Fire"
Ace3-r1066\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0-3.lua:120: in function <Ace3\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119>

Locals:
nil

Maybee this TMW Window cause the message?
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SMELEEAP ^SOperator^S> ^SLevel^N100001 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SName^SRichtspruch ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60345^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Morwo | Imported from CurseForge issue #668 | Raw

comments.body:
I already fixed this issue and told you about it in your first ticket.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/665-lua-error-message-21-10/

Get the fix in the latest alpha version here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/

Edited Oct 22, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
